title: Islami Dawah
description: A multilingual Next.js platform for managing dawah activities, reports, and admin workflows.
longDescription: Islami Dawah is a Next.js (App Router) + TypeScript application for coordinating and reporting Islamic outreach activities. It features role-based dashboards (admin, dayi/ambassador, assistant, and user), rich editor support for detailed reports, PDF export, task and weekly-plan management, email notifications, and i18n for Bengali/English. The UI uses Tailwind CSS and a component library; data persistence is powered by Prisma/Postgres. The app includes optimized admin APIs, batched comparison endpoints, and utilities for exporting reports as PDFs. Designed for deployment on Vercel.
